» The complexity of the today’s projects mandates efficient planning, cost management, and time management.
Involvement of many partners in construction contracts also requires the thorough and professional analysis and management of project’s document.

» As a project manager, ECB assigns a team of highly qualified professionals who will take total ownership of the project.
This team will become the pillar of the project, The team will be the point of coordination and contact between the client and all projects’ stakeholders during all phases of the project.

» Our experienced project management staff works actively to ensure the project’s success in coherence with the client’s needs and project specification.
Through the proper control and management of the project’s different phases, we ensure that the projects are completed on schedule, within budget, and with the desired quality.

» ECB provides Project Management Services in full spectrum or in individual tasks for the following scopes:

★ Design Management.
★ Tendering & Procurement.
★ Contract Administration.
★ Construction Management.
★ Scheduling and Time Management.
★ Cost Management & Budgeting.
★ Claims Management.

 

★ DESIGN MANAGEMENT

Design management, through a dedicated design manager working with the project manager on behalf of the owner, primarily seeks to establish project management practices that are focused on enhancing the design process across the entire design team.
The successful implementation of owner focused design management throughout the entire project lifecycle can represent the difference between the success and failure of the project.

★ TENDERING & PROCUREMENT

An effective procurement management and tender process provides a positive evaluation approach that leads not only to the appointment of appropriate consultant, contractor and suppliers but to ensure that the ongoing relationship is mutually beneficial.
A wholly balanced and highly efficient tender management process improves the quality of the project while reducing costs and managing risks. 

★ CONTRACT MANAGEMENT

Since the poor administration of construction contract agreement could jeopardize the overall success of the project, we manage and administer contracts with the highest level of professionalism and with the help of our high-caliber contract expertise.

★ CONSTRUCTION MANAGEMENT

ECB’s treats the design and construction phases as integrated stages; therefore, it is imperative that our CM professionals are involved in the project since the earliest stages of design.
The involvement of the CM in the early phases of the project’s design has proven to be efficient and effective, Our CM personnel can offer valuable advice during the design stages that will help avoid any costly change order after the construction contract is awarded.

★ TIME MANAGEMENT

We believe that a well-planned job is a half-done job. Therefore, our scheduling and planning professional work on applying a set of strategies and planning techniques to ensure timely completion of all project’s phases and mile stones. Our planning & scheduling consultants understand our client’s ideas and objectives and transform them to program and mile stones. Then they control the program throughout the project’s execution by ensuring that the contractor is in full coherence with the project’s predefined time schedule and plan.

★ COST MANAGEMENT

Cost management is one of the most important aspects in a successful project, The main objective of our cost management division is to maintain and control project’s cost within the prescribed projects’ budget.

★ CLAIMS MANAGEMENT

Claims and disputes are inevitable in the construction industry.
Our job is to early identify those claims and try to advice on any necessary avoidance plan.
Our claims management & resolution professional will represent the owner in any claims or disputes that might arise during the project.
